name: Infestation (itch) (Matter Collapse)
description:
Beetles will come out of the bottom left.

You can allow only 5 hit points worth of beetles through the gates top right before the infestation becomes critical. The beetles will become stronger over time. New types of beetles will also emerge.

Place towers to attack the beetle swarm by paying parts you get from them.

Left Click - demolish tower 

Right click - place tower 

Middle Click - Merge Towers. 

Merging small Towers costs 40 parts and merging medium towers costs 160 parts.
